IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE FOUNDATION'S MISSION IS TO SUPPORT THE HEALTH, WELFARE, EDUCATIONAL INTERESTS OF THE MATHEMATICS, SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL (THE "SCHOOL"), A PENNSYLVANIA NONPROFIT CORPORATION THAT IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAX AS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1986 (THE "CODE"), AS AMENDED.THE FOUNDATION IS A NONPROFIT CORPORATION ESTABLISHED UNDER THE LAWS OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA. THE PURPOSES FOR WHICH THE FOUNDATION IS ORGANIZED AND OPERATED ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE AND EDUCATIONAL WITHIN THE MEANING OF SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE CODE, AND, IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE PURPOSES, THE FOUNDATION MAY: (A) OPERATE EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE SUPPORT AND BENEFIT OF THE SCHOOL AND ITS AFFILIATED OR CONTROLLED ORGANIZATIONS THAT ARE PUBLICLY SUPPORTED CHARTITIES AS DEFINED UNDER THE CODE; (B) UTILIZE RESOURCES FOR THE PURPOSES OF REPLICATING THE SCHOOL'S EDUCATIONAL MODEL; (C) RECEIVE CONTRIBUTIONS FROM WHATEVER SOURCE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE FOUNDATION'S MISSION IS TO SUPPORT THE HEALTH, WELFARE, EDUCATIONAL INTERESTS OF THE MATHEMATICS, SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL (THE "SCHOOL"), A PENNSYLVANIA NONPROFIT CORPORATION THAT IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAX AS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1986 (THE "CODE"), AS AMENDED.THE FOUNDATION IS A NONPROFIT CORPORATION ESTABLISHED UNDER THE LAWS OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA. THE PURPOSES FOR WHICH THE FOUNDATION IS ORGANIZED AND OPERATED ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE AND EDUCATIONAL WITHIN THE MEANING OF SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE CODE, AND, IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE PURPOSES, THE FOUNDATION MAY: (A) OPERATE EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE SUPPORT AND BENEFIT OF THE SCHOOL AND ITS AFFILIATED OR CONTROLLED ORGANIZATIONS THAT ARE PUBLICLY SUPPORTED CHARTITIES AS DEFINED UNDER THE CODE; (B) UTILIZE RESOURCES FOR THE PURPOSES OF REPLICATING THE SCHOOL'S EDUCATIONAL MODEL; (C) RECEIVE CONTRIBUTIONS FROM WHATEVER SOURCE.
IRS990.Desc: ORGANIZATION LEASES PROPERTY TO MATHEMATICS, SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL, A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ENTITY FORMED UNDER 501(C)(3) ID# 23-2963763 AND MAST COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL II, A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ENTITY FORMED UNDER 501(C)(3) ID# 47-3810173.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ORGANIZATION IS WORKING TOWARD THE REPLICATION OF THE SCHOOL'S EDUCATION MODEL IN OTHER LOCAL SCHOOL DISTRICTS AND HAS SUCCESSFULLY REPLICATED THE SCHOOL'S EDUCATIONAL MODEL IN PHILADELPHIA, PA.

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MATHEMATICS SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: ISAAC NEWTON FOUNDATION'S PURPOSE IS TO OPERATE EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE SUPPORT AND BENEFIT OF THE MATHEMATICS, SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL AND ITS AFFILIATED OR CONTROLLED ORGANIZATIONS, PROVIDED THAT SUCH ORGANIZATIONS ARE PUBLICLY SUPPORTED ORGANIZATIONS. MAST COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL II IS DESIGNATED BY THIS PURPOSE AND IS CONSIDERED AN AFFILIATE OF MATHEMATICS, SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL.
MAST COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL II WAS CREATED THROUGH THE REPLICATION OF MATHEMATICS, SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY COMMUNITY CHARTER SCHOOL'S EDUCATIONAL MODEL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION IS A PENNSYLVANIA NOTFORPROFIT CORPORATION. THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE HAS ISSUED A DETERMINATION LETTER THAT THE FOUNDATION IS A NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION, AS DEFINED UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. AS SUCH, THE FOUNDATION IS GENERALLY EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES. IT IS HOWEVER, REQUIRED TO FILE FEDERAL FORM 990 RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX. THIS IS AN INFORMATIONAL RETURN ONLY. THE FOUNDATION WOULD BE TAXED ON UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME WHICH DOES NOT FALL UNDER THE 501(C)(3) EXEMPTION. MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT THE FOUNDATION HAS RECEIVED NO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME AND ACCORDINGLY, THERE WAS NO INCOME TAX ON UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. ADDITIONALLY, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. TAX YEARS WHICH REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION AS OF JUNE 30, 2018 ARE 2015 THROUGH 2017, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY ARE FILED.
DIRECT FUNDRAISING EXPENSES INCLUDED ON THE STATEMENT OF REVENUE 17,832.
DIRECT FUNDRAISING EXPENSES INCLUDED ON THE STATEMENT OF REVENUE 17,832.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT DURING CONSTRUCTION OF NEW FACILITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO FILE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ISAAC NEWTON FOUNDATION, INC. MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

THE PROCESS FOR ASSUMING RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT OF THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT BY THOSE CHARGED WITH GOVERNANCE HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
